full_title_(бүтэн_гарчиг): *, ,BSNYEN YIG DNGOS GRUB RGYA MTSO ZHES BYA BA BZHUGS SO, ,
colophon_(төгсгөлийн_үг): @022B CES BSNYEN YIG DNGOS GRUB @023A *, ,RGYA MTSO ZHES BYA BA 'DI NI RANG GI NYE 'KHOR BA DKA' BCU SHES DAR BA SOGS DU MA DANG, SNGON GOMS LEGS SPYAD KYI BAG CHAGS 'THUG PO SAD CING, SKYE BAS THOB PA DANG, SBYANGS PA'I RNAM DPYOD MCHOG TU YANGS PA RGYAL DBANG DGE 'DUN RGYA MTSO'I GDAN SA CHEN PO RGYAL ME TOG THAD GI SENG GE'I KHRIR 'KHOD PA'I MKHAN RIN PO CHE CHES PA BDE THANG SPRUL SKU BLO BZANG RIN CHEN TSANGS DBYANGS PHYOGS LAS RNAM PAR RGYAL BA DANG, NANG RIGS PA DANG GSO BA RIG PA LA RNAM DPYOD YANGS PA'I RAB 'BYAMS SMRA BA NGAG DBANG BSTAN 'DZIN MDO SNGAGS RAB 'BYAMS LA SBYANGS PA MI DMAN ZHING RNAM DPYOD YANGS PA'I RAB 'BYAMS SMRA BA BSTAN GRAGS PA, SKYE BAS THOB PA'I BLO GROS KYI RTZA LA GSUNG RAB LA LTA BA'I MIG DANG LDAN ZHING DON GNYER DANG BCAS PA'I DGE SLONG CHOS RGYA MTSO DANG TSUL KHRIMS DPAL BZANG LA SOGS PA'I DON GNYER CAN MANG POS BSKUL BA'I NGOR SPRAD BAN SNYOMS LAS PA NGAG DBANG BLO BZANG CHOS LDAN GYIS MTSO BDUN GYI LHA KHANG CHEN MOR SBYAR BA'I YI GE PA NI RNAM DPYOD RJE BRTZON PA MI DMAN PA'I DGE SLONG GRAGS PA'O, ,'DIS KYANG RGYAL BA'I BSTAN PA DAR ZHING RGYAS LA YUN RING DU GNAS PAR GYUR CIG , ,,
author_simple: NGAG DBANG BLO BZANG CHOS LDAN,
